page.title: 02FAIR OAK NEWS -JUNE 1985
page.content: { New Village Hall.}Work expected to start in June and hall to be ready for use in March 1986 and will cost Â£239000. {BMX Bicycles. }Complaints about the irresponsible riding of bicycles on pavements and bicycles being left on pavements outside shops. Police to take action where necessary. {Doggie Walk.}A special area had been set aside for the walking of dogs on the Recreation Ground to avoid the inconveniece to other users of the area.{ {Minibus For Elderly.}The bus for taking the elderly to the shops was losing about Â£20 a month. {Fair Oak Plan.}There was a great deal of discussion about the effect on the area of the new plan to develop the Fair Oak,Bishopstoke and Airport area, which would cause great changes.
